providers.summary:
Dear Client, Please visit the accents area on my site for youtube galleries, at adambehr.com, samples, then when you select a vo category, choose youtube gallery. 

My name is Adam Behr, an Award-winning Voice -artist with my own protools studio, with ISDN and phone patch.

 see my youtube gallery, view all here:    http://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=63A65F60301EE36C

or playlists here:
http://www.youtube.com/user/tundramonkey100#g/p

accent clips and more bio here:
http://www.voicebank.co.za/pages/Recording_Artists_bio.asp?SearchType=Keyword&searchRun=182541&show=bio&ArtistID=3430
Videogame Gallery here: http://gamevoices.ning.com/video/video/listForContributor?screenName=2knke6h2qepqv&sort=highestRated

I can deliver the voiceover for your project, in any format (wav,mp3, aiff,etc),  usually in 2-24 hrs. 
Paypal preferred . 

PST+ 10 hrs,EST+7hrs: cell :( dialing from N. America) 
011 2771 015 6370
From anywhere else: +27(0)71 015 6370
Audiomark1000@gmail.com



Contact me right away for trailer demos for games, films or TV in US or International Styles.
Commercial,narration,promos with video,trailers,USA and International,PSA,audio and video,telephone messaging ,animation.  

Dialects (In English language) : 
African,South African,Arabic,Middle eastern,Australian,Israeli, French,Spanish,British(various),Caribbean,Japanese, Chinese,Italian,Russian,Eastern European, Portuguese,Portuguese brazilian,East Indian,West Indian,Scottish,Hungarian,Greek,Turkish.

Impersonations: Borat,Ali G,Bishop Tutu,Daniel Craig, others.
 

 Testimonials:

"Adam Behr has a unique and distinctive voice. He demonstrates great voice technique and an ability to quickly follow direction. He is always on our first call list and I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking to raise their project to the next level. Adam is a world class voiceover talent."

 Doug Paterson, President, Big World Sound, Vancouver, BC, Canada 



We were very impressed with Adam's professional attitude. He was very easy to work with, and was able to capture the feeling we wanted very quickly. His voice is amazing, we got numerous positive comments on it. We would love to work with him again. 

Tracy Baylen ,Marketing and Communications 
Campus Crusade for Christ, Canada 


“Adam Behr’s outstanding voice talent and professionalism allowed us to create an inspiring game trailer that captured the essence of our flagship product EVE Online. With his voice, we were able to achieve the exact degree of perfection that we were looking for.” 

Magnús Bergsson, Chief Marketing Officer,
 CCP Games, Reykjavik, Iceland


Once or twice in my career as a Hollywood agent and now, as a leading Voice Over coach, I get to share in the growth and success of a true Star.
I am proud to say that the most unique of these rare finds is the mold-breaking, deeply gifted, wickedly silly, crisply professional, worldly avant-garde human jukebox, Adam Behr.
To me, he is the definition of what it means to be TALENT. And - oh yeah – that voice is just deliciously sexy.
Nancy Wolfson
President, Braintracks Audio
 


Adam Behr is a real asset for our company. Being a travel show for high-end hotels, we need sophistication and distinction and that is what Adam Behr delivers. He has excellent range as well which makes him suitable for a wide variety of projects. Plus, he is professional, reliable and outstanding to work with – Every time I ask him to do something for me, he delivers plus extra. Every producer needs an Adam Behr!!! 

Londin Ryan, Executive Producer 
City Explorer TV 


I wanted to let you know how pleased my distributor and I are with the narrator we found! Adam Behr delivered an incredible performance for our documentary! The quality of his recording studio was as high as any studio I've worked with in Los Angeles. Though we were in different countries, we were able to work well and in a timely manner using the phone and internet. Adam was wonderful to work with and really came through for us. I would recommend him, and your service to anyone in need of top-notch talent. Thank you!
 
Lynn Stevenson, 
Producer "Intimate Biographies"- 
Delta International.



"Adam is not only a top-notch voice talent, but his versatility makes him incredibly responsive to direction. He was an absolute pleasure to work with."
 Greg Harrison, director 

Adam - you nailed it!! Thank you thank you thank you thank you!! You're the best - thanks for patience with email directing. It is greatly appreciated! 
You are my hero of the day. These sound so good! Thank you thank you. The client is going to be thrilled.
Kim Tierney Writer/Producer chickINchair Production, USA 


"Adam Behr is one of the most versatile American voiceovers that I came across in my search for voices. He is able to transform into other characters like no others and is also able to deliver any content in the right emotional state. He has a magic voice..."

 Alexander Schottky, evox ltd. (Holland)



English ( S.afr/Brit/Aus/ N.American/ E.Indian. /Scottish/ African)

providers.headline: Conversational, Confident, Bright, Guy next door, Believable, Authentic, Real. Hear more of my demos? click on "more info"
providers.summary:
Welcome to a place I like to call Steve Ket’s Voiceover Beach.  If you landed here looking for a specific voice sound description that wasn't on the first demo that you were presented with here after your search, try checking out all my demos located on the righthand side of my main page.  (a specific keyword search just brings up our name and first "main" demo tied to the key search words you probably used.)  Chances are, what you're looking for is on one my specific demos to the right and on down the page.  If you like what you hear PLEASE add me to your preferred Voices for future castings!

If you’re an industry pro you can probably skip down several paragraphs.   If you’re here because you liked what you heard on my demo and are mainly curious about the cost then I might not be the talent you’re looking for.

To me, every Voiceover is a performance.  It’s not a “commodity” to be measured, quantified and “priced” by how many words it is or long it is.  If that was the case then why ask for a bunch of auditions and listen to them and choose one based on what?  Ah yes the performance.  The ability to draw you in, convince you, entertain and inform you.  All because one of those “performances” just some how just sounds better than the others right?  Okay great Steve but what is this going to cost?  Well let’s start with a good reference link to copy & paste and bookmark for future budgeting considerations to help you understand what Professional Voice Talents are getting for good and GREAT performances today.

http://www.globalvoiceacademy.com/gvaa-rate-guide/

Professional Voiceover performances are priced by use (where they will be seen and or heard) and for how long it will be used.  “In Perpetuity” is a long time.  That should be worth some thing.  You don’t want to be the Voice talent who agrees to be the voice of something in perpetuity for $500 only to discover that you are now frozen out of that specific category for the rest of your life.

I realize that sometimes you, the Voice-caster, Producer or Director may like the "sound" of a voice on a demo.  But wonder how they will "sound" with your projects "voice" you hear in your head.  That's why I also offer FREE coached or directed auditions via Source Connect, iPDTL, ISDN, Skype or Phone patch.  Saving us both time.  Again it's FREE why not kick things around it's only going to cost you your time?   Also if you can share with me which clip or part of my demo you liked and "hear" your copy or project being read/delivered in the same manner that is VERY helpful!

The great thing is that there are thousands people offering voice over.  If price is your sole concern and it’s simply a commodity to you, I’m sure you can find someone here.  But will they be available three months from now when you need to change out a line of copy and will it match the previous performance for sound quality and style?  Will they be able to get that audio back to you that same day?  Will they be able to offer copy change ideas on the spot based on YEARS of experience to help keep your project moving forward and on time?  This is not a side hobby for me.  It’s a full time love affair.  I travel with a studio matching go bag so my clients are never without audio.  And I’ve recorded thousands of punches and pickups from some crazy locations, just ask my wife. And yes that includes while on vacation and the Holidays.

I’m also constantly honing my craft and skills.  I train and coach with people like Marice Tobias, Mary Lynn Wissner, Harry Dunn and Jodi Gottlieb.  Google their names and you’ll see why.

We’ve lived in Dallas, Miami to Minneapolis but growing up in the midwest, married to a farmers daughter I haven’t lost my small town work ethic.   On the other hand I've got a couple decades of life experiences I try to use in my reads, like Carrier landing on the deck of the U.S.S. Enterprise, snorkeling with black tip sharks to having narrowly escaped being duct taped, naked and upside down to an AUTEC Island Palm tree by U.S. Special forces! (true story ask me to explain what happened and why “air traffic Controllers” need to be respected)

As a professional stand up comic and Moth Story Telling performer, I have a keen ear for tones that perfectly lends itself to produce natural sounding accents that will fit perfectly into your documentary, narration, commercial, eLearning Module, or International Corporate Trainings. I am also especially adept at impersonating and emulating voices and personalities. I strive to create characters whose sound captures the feel and culture of that specific voice.

My home and road studio has iPDTL, ISDN, Source Connect, Phone Patching and Skype.  It's also portable thanks to my Apollo twin and UA plugin technology. 

I do VO for Commercials, Visual Messaging, Explainer Videos, WhiteBoard Videos, Instructional, DRTV, How to videos, DIY, web page landing videos, Sizzle reels, long form narration.  Name it and I’ve probably done it.

I understand that your life is busy and you need someone who can deliver the right reads, perfect quality, and prompt service THE FIRST TIME.  I absolutely LOVE what I do and it’s provided an amazing life for me because I deliver amazing Customer Service

Let me help you TELL YOUR STORY, whether it's in 10 seconds, 10 minutes or more.  I can give you a variety of different styles and emotions to match whatever you're going for.  Check out my many different Vimeo VO demos from actual clients I work with every day right here https://vimeo.com/steveketvo  Producers say that I take direction well.  If you want we can phone patch, Skype, Source Connect or ISDN together right into my booth in real time and create that “sound” you hear in your head right now it’s absolutely FREE and doesn’t cost extra.  If time permits I’m usually up for a FREE scratch read that you can drop into your pitch.

I know how frustrating it can be when people don't return your phone calls or emails.  I don't do that. 

YOU ARE A REAL PERSON to me. I know you've got deadlines and people you’re answering to!  I can promise to deliver your recording within 24 HOURS usually within hours. My rates are competitive and I’ll give you CLEAR COMMUNICATION throughout. My studio is state of the art and I even travel with a matching portable studio “go bag” with my Universal Audio Apollo Gears’ little brother the Apollo Twin and matching Sennheiser 416 mic.   My goal is to build a long term relationship built on a trust that you know I can deliver what you need when you need it. 

If you are looking for a friendly, professional, experienced, easy to work with and dependable voice for your next campaign please contact me.  For booking information or just to ask a simple question, email me at: ketvoice@gmail.com  call 561-628-8552 or check out www.steveket.com.

Why did I reference voiceover beach way at the beginning of this conversation?  Because I live and work and a very beautiful part of the world that you can explore at this link

https://www.instagram.com/voiceoverbeach/

VOICE STYLE/TYPE

*CONVERSATIONAL - REAL - GUY NEXT DOOR - VERSATILE VOICE-* I have a warm approachable, friendly voice that pleasantly resonates in both higher and lower registers, producing a natural sound that audiences quickly trust. Many producers say I have a nice Alec Baldwin meets Kevin Bacon tone/sound. 

Steve is consistently cast for a wide range of age requirements . . . male 20's, 30's, 40's, and 50's (25-54).

My voiceover reads have been described as friendly, genuine, authentic, believable, guy next door, high energy, hard sell, soft sell, sincere, cool, hip, caring, corporate, compelling, story teller, relatable, smart, knowledgeable, sophisticated, urgent and educational.

My voice is strong but also versatile, allowing me to boldly and confidently deliver strong passionate messages, or softly narrate and tell a story that keeps listeners feeling comfortable and engaged. Whether you are producing a commercial with Dennis Leary style attitude or believable Matt Damon confidence, A deadpan Nick Offerman to a documentary, a movie trailer, a cartoon pilot, an internet release, a product demo, an explainer demo, a corporate piece for use internally or with clients, or even your company's automated telephone attendant, I have the experience and versatility to bring your script to life. Whether that be a natural Guy Next Door neighbor, Middle Age Corporate Trainer, or Wise Old Man, I will deliver the performance you want. I even do spot on impressions. If you need one of the Simpsons to President trump to an ex president, Dennis Leary attitude, a Jon Hamm style or John Corbett style read, A Ray Ramano, easy going guy, Jack Nicholsen or that Movie Trailer voice Don La Fontaine delivery, ask me for a custom demo of your script

TESTIMONIALS 
I had the pleasure of working with Steve Ket on a project called “ERP FrankenCloud”. Steve managed to create a version of Dr. Frankenstein that struck the right tone of mad scientist, technology visionary and despondent business leader – all in an Elizabethan tone. I was nervous that someone could even pull this off. He not only nailed it, but he offered a range of options to pick from. And he could repeat it with each edit and new job we asked of him. His turn around was fast, he took direction well and added value at ever turn. All in all, Steve Ket is a real professional with amazing range -- I highly recommend him. 

Steve Casey 
Marketing Communications & Creative Director
FinancialForce.com

Phase 3 Films - Orange California Working with Steve was awesome.  His flexibility, versatility and commitment to getting the spot just right made things run as smooth as silk.  He is at the top of my callback list.  Todd Yates Director  

Southern Pride Cookers We were looking for an authoritative voice that would appeal to men and women in the foodservice industry.  Steve's voice was an instant choice after our exhausting search.  Once we made communication, the project was complete in less than 24 hours and he absolutely nailed it on the first pass.  Excellent work Steve!  Thanks for making us look so good.  

Prudential Securities "I was fortunate to find Steve, he exceeded my expectations in every possible way. Steve was professional, courteous, and did a terrific job, and even turned around work very quickly over the holidays. I would recommend Steve to anyone looking for professional voiceover work done quickly, and professionally!"    

***** "Steve is an amazing talent to work with; his rich and engaging voice will turn heads every time.  He goes the extra mile to make certain he understands exactly what it is that is needed.  Pickups, if any, are swift and perfect.  I will happily work with him again." -Shawna Cook Lab51 Media Creative Lead

providers.headline: Natural, impressions, impersonations, versatile,
providers.summary:
From the Guy next door to the non-announcery announcer, J.S. has been featured voice over on commercials large and small, corporate narration, voice mail that works, video games, animation, talking greeting cards, e-learning, talking dolls, websites and in-store presentations.

He is an American male voice talent that can perform many United States and foreign accents. HIs extremely versatile recording style and broad range easily goes from bold, confident to animated, conversational, warm and friendly. As a corporate narrator, he moves from a professional and informative tone to very different deliveries.

He has voiced and produced numerous tv spots, radio spots and other commercial and promotional projects.

A former stand up comic and trained professional actor, J.S. brings a depth to his performances, making the words jump from the page.

He has a large range, accurately portraying everything from 30 something voices to male voices in their 90's. He can impersonate hundreds of celebrity voices, including other voice talent - dead and alive. Voice matching is one of his strong suits. But his ability to act; everything from crying on demand to complete elation is what separates J.S. from the many hundreds of other voice talent here who simply haven't put in the time and effort to be professional talent.

(search support: J S Gilbert, JS Gilbert, Jay Gilbert)
providers.additional_details:
Almost 20 years. He has won awards as a voice actor, audio engineer/ director and audio producer. J.S. has performed narration for Intel, Compaq, NASA, The Getty Museum, and many others, including the rollout of Quicktime for Apple Computing. He has performed for major ad agency's including Goodby Silverstein, Crispin Porter, McCann Erickson, Riney, Leo Burnett< BBDO, DDB and many others. Commercially, he has been featured on Sprint, Clorox, Round Table, History Channel, Pepsi, McDonalds, Ford, St. Vincent de Paul, The Heart Association, SmithKline, Nestle, Microsoft, Arby's, Siemens, San Diego Visitors Bureau, Virginia Lottery,  dozens of automotive dealerships and hundreds of local, and regional spots. J.S. also performs on hold and message for voice mail for everyone from Arby's to the American Medical Association. He has been the voice of talking greeting cards, all the way through to being the voice of a Batman doll, games for Atari, Commodore, Strategic Simulations, Sony, EA, Konami and Koei, and was named "favorite voice-over" for his work as Sweet Tooth in Twisted Metal: Black. He is also featured on Dynasty Warriors, Extermination, Socum: Navy Seals, Bone, Operation, Learning Company, Leap Frog and many others. His awards include Top Ten Producers List 1997 Multimedia Magazine, A Clio, Numerous Addys, Invision Awards, Joeys. J.S. also did v.o. for Gold Rush, a part of the Emmy award winning "10 Days that Changed History".   He was featured as the voice of Avdol on 13 episodes of the animae "Jojo's Bizarre Adventure". He performs all of the male voiceover on "Go Bananas", for Nickelodeon. He also does all the male voices on "Big Mean Weenie" and "Heroes" for technotoon. J.S. has also been in voice over casting, talent direction and production.  He owns several sound effects and music collections and can produce finished radio spots and t.v. commercials, as well as on-hold and voicemail and industrials.

Ongoing and extensive. He has performed improvisation for over 25 years, including several guest appearances with Second City. He is also a former stand-up comic. J.S. is also a trained audio and video engineer and maintains an extensive recording facility. J.S. has also written hundreds of radio and t.v. spots, as well as handled script prep and re-writes for projects ranging from Peter Norton's P.C. Guru to recorded museum docent tours. J.S. is on the advisory board to the Art Institute of California's Advertising Degree Program. He is also former San Francisco Bay Area ADDY Awards Chair and is on the Board of Directors for the Bay Area Advertising Relief Committee (BAARC) and J.S. was on the advisory committee and a contributing writer to Create Magazine.
A professional studio with a triple walled 6X9 sound booth, with ADR capabilities. Microphones include Neumann U87, Sennheiser 416, Telefunken U47, Rhode NT1, RCA ribbon, Pearlman custom built Hybrid (ELA 251 soundalike) Mic Pre's include Millenia ST-1, Avalon Gold, Drawmer MX-60, tons of outboard gear and Waves Diamond plug-ins, Apogee Rosetta AD/DA. Dedicated Quad Core system for recording. Travel system includes an micport pro, Fujitsu Lifebook, RE-20 and Oktava modded 219 microphones and personal travel booth. -61 db at -9 average RMS recordings from Hotel room.

Additional voice actors can be cast to provide full project support. Localization services are also available, including ADR and lock to pivture.
J.S. won't waste your time.  He understands that the face of the industry is rapidly changing and is determined not to be left behind. He currently has clients located all over the globe, and understands the challenges of non face-to-face relationships. 
If you are looking for a smart voice talent that brings a lot of value to the table then contact J.S. regarding your project. Female talent, as well as additional male actors is also available for projects requiring ensemble work.
Give him a voiceover audition and see what happens. J.S. Gilbert is not a voice talent, but a problem solver. Google his name and you will find thousands of references to his long and varied voiceover career.
providers.description: Traveling abroad gave J.S. a distinct ability to "mimic" accents. Scottish, Irish, English, Russian, South American as well as Southern United States, Western United States, various East Coast and West Coast regional accents . Senator John McCain, Austin Powers, Doc Brown from Back To The Future, George C. Scott, Groucho Marx, Humphrey Bogart, Jack Nicholson, Inspector Clouseau, Johnny Carson, William Shatner, Star Trek characters, Rod Serling, Bill Clinton, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sam Elliott, Hal Riney, Cheech and Chong, Mr. Ed, Truman Capote, John Wayne, Robin Williams, Ed Sullivan, Jimmy Stewart, Topo Gigio, Sylvester the Cat, Sylvester Stallone, Snagglepuss, Richard Simmons, Andy Rooney, Rocky and Bullwinkle, Beany and Cecil, Tony the tiger, Popeye, James Mason, Bella Lugosi, Frankenstein, Boris Karloff, Henry Kissinger, Richard Nixon, Ronald Regan, James Earl Jones, Darth Vader,Geoffrey Holder, Forrest Gump, Lewis Black, Buddy Hackett, Morgan Freeman, Gilbert Gottfried, Goofy, Jackie Gleason, Art Carney, Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Truman Capote, monster voices, heroes, Snidley Whiplash, Boris, Don Adams, The Claw, Inspector Gadget, Papa Smurf

providers.headline: Conversational, warm and friendly, dramatic, high energy, compassionate, gentle, intelligent
providers.summary:
Find me on the web at scottallenvoice.com, or email me at scott@scottallenvoice.com. 

Call direct (310) 678-5060

MY VOICE SPEAKS FOR ITSELF -
Can you hear the sound of success? When companies like Ford, Samsung, and Fidelity search for voices to match with products, they're looking for a unique delivery that will help listeners hear their message. Let me help you do that for your customers. When you listen to my demos, I think you'll find that my voice speaks for itself.

I have a classic, powerful, deep male voice with a generic North American accent. My voice is strong yet versatile, and I can aptly perform a range of tones and inflections from young adult to wise old man. 

Whether you're producing a commercial, documentary, an internet release, a product demo, corporate piece (internal or for clients), or even your company's automated telephone attendant, I can bring the quality, sound, and versatility needed to bring your unique script to life.

If you want your project done right, fast and with a smile, you’ve found the right man.

Voiceover is my passion and you will hear  and experience it when you work with me. You can rest assured that you have hired a professional talent, with professional equipment, and a total customer service experience.

Be sure to BOOKMARK my page or add me to your "FAVORITES" list so you can find me when you need me!

CUSTOMER SERVICE-
I pride myself in providing the highest level of service in all aspects of my work and I vow that when hired to voice your project, I will not rest until you have a voiceover that you are completely elated with. Customer satisfaction is my number one priority at all times. I will go the extra mile to make sure you get what you pay for and more! 

AN EXPERIENCED PROFESSIONAL-
I have produced E-Learning and training videos and audio professionally for the past 7 years in addition to voicing several "fashion related" web promos and telephone call attendant systems for local companies. I have also produced several audiobooks providing everything from recording to the final edited & finished files.


Friendly, Happy, Bright, Cheerful, Commercial, Promo, Trailer, Product Intro, Dude Next Door, Emotion, Natural, Approachable, Business, Baritone, Smooth, Raspy, Deep, Whisper, Speak, Corporate, Tough, Young, Mature, Authoritative, Confidence, Urgency, Current, Fresh, Relaxing, Sincere, Comforting, Call to Action, Millennial, Athletic, Contemporary, Guy Next Door, Commercial, Accent, Business, eLearning, Education, Movie Trailer, Narrator, Audiobook, Cartoon, Authoritative, Natural, Confident, Young Adult, Broadcast, Television, Radio, Internet
providers.additional_details:
My education as a voice talent never stops. I make it my purpose to hone and improve my skills at every opportunity in order to offer my clients the highest possible value for their money. 

Previous training includes:
Marc Cashman - VO Coaching (Commercial)
The Voicecaster - VO For Actors and Animation Workshops
Training with Stephen Stanton (www.stephenstanton.com) - VO Coaching (Commercial)
Kalmenson & Kalmenson Voice Casting - VO For Actors and Animation Workshop
American Academy of Dramatic Arts - Theatrical Performing
I have a professional home studio and am capable of delivering quality tracks on demand.
I have created professional E-Learning audio and video for the past 7 years. I'm a trained actor (theatrical, commercial, film) and have worked on a small number of films, but I have always loved creating characters and sounds with my Voice. I've a ton of life experience and talent to portray all of it vocally for commercial or animated needs.

Accents: British, Australian, Irish, Southern, French, Indian.
Character and Animation voices and sounds (examples): Evil villain, Heroic, baby, child, dog, cat, farm animals, sci-fi sounds

providers.headline: Truthful, Tween, Youthful, Teen
providers.summary:
Why choose me for your next project?
I'm Burbank based and cam go to any Los Angeles Studio. Clients have found me a trustworthy voice of some of the world’s most trusted products. Your search for the believable tween, child, and teen character... ends here.

And why is this? It's because I continually sharpen my skills by training with some of the top notch VO coaches in the business and hone my knack for improvisation as well. I do this to stay sharp and focused in commitment to deliver my best to you- to keep you booking me time and time again!

Because of this commitment to excellence, I've gotten to record hundreds of radio spots, commercials, video games, narrations, audio books, internet videos, educational scripts, television projects, podcasts, and case studies in both the English and Japanese languages. What may I do for your next project?

VOICE STYLE/TYPE
Clients describe my style of voice acting and voice over  as youthful, energetic, authentic, authentic child, sincere, believable, conversational, natural, knowledgeable, promo, urgent, and educational. Clients consistently cast J.E. for a diverse age range, from authentic preschool boy, tween, teenage boy, young adult male, middle age male (40-60), middle aged male (45-65), and senior male (66-85). 

Previous audiobooks include Arthur's Computer Disaster, Diary Of A Minecraft Zombie,  Captain Underpants Book One, and The Adventures of Shelby Holmes!

Whether you are looking for the right characters for animation, ADR, children's television, or narration- in Neutral American English or Japanese (Osaka-ben and Tokyo-ben), I offer a Free consultation to learn how I can serve your project needs.

Reach out today to get the ball rolling!

I'm the Japanese language narrator of Usagi to Kame (Children's Story), and authentic children Dillan the Armadillo and Tomas Tomato, both of Taco Friends. I also voice older characters.

PERFORMANCE ABILITIES
Clients use Youthful as the first word that comes to mind to describe my voice. Natural, Youthful,  Textured, Tween, Conversational, Millenial, Gripping, Energetic, Trustworthy. Whether your need is a voice over for a case study, podcast, educational script, on-hold message, tutorial, mobile app (ios or android), radio, copywriting, translation, video, or voice acting for a tv project, video game, ADR, dubbing, or the silver screen, I can deliver it!

BUSINESS ACUMEN
Possessing a lifelong background as a cooperative in the community service sector, my approach as business partner and relationship investor is no different. Team synergy ought to be as easy as collaborating in the same office. 

Communication is streamlined and frequent, and work is completed timely (often that day!). 
So you never need guess your project's progress, or worry if it will be completed on time.
Some of our world's most trusted brands trust my voice and delivery- so can you!
providers.additional_details:
I have over 9 years of paid recording for promos, commercials, radio spots, and video games for some of the world's top brands. Most recent credits include:

I am ever taking opportunities to improve my craft nonstop- to better serve clients- whether workshops, coaching sessions, or voice instruction as a voiceover artist.
Acoustically treated Whisper Room Recording Booth

DAW: Audacity

Music Composition

I'm also a classical animator who specializes in illustrated animations.

... and possess a 12 year application of Audio multimedia including Acoustica Mixcraft, Sony Vegas, Audacity, ProTools, Caustic single cell music composition software. I'm ever learning techniques and deliveries to better serve you.

WARNING: Any institutions or individuals using this site or any of its associated sites for studies or projects-you DO NOT have permission to use any of my profile or pictures in any form or forum both current and future. If you have or do, it will be considered a violation of my privacy and will be subject to legal ramifications. This picture is the property of J.E. Burton and Kenneth Dolin Photography. It is recommended that other members post a similar notice.
